skillTree.localised_description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Even in death, Shaggoths are invigorated by the touch of lightning, and the roar of the storm.

effects.description: Tempests Rage and Old Bones Creak Under The Strain Of Their Runes Of Control

phases.onscreen_name: Make them pay for all I have lost!

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
If they wont move, make them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Like all Shaggoths, this one is covered by a thick, spiny carapace that is impervious to almost everything.
It takes something the size and strength of a mighty Dragon Ogre to defeat and kill a Giant, and it just so happens that there is one on handâ€¦
A titanic blow delivered by a Shaggoths great weapon is tantamount to the tectonic plates beneath the world shifting and colliding.

effects.description: Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence)

+ 15 Charge Bonus For Dragon Ogre Wights
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Arise my minion, set fourth once more and deliver my wrath to mine enemies!
Whenever the sky darkens with cloud and thunder rumbles on the horizon, all who know of the legend of the Suneater shiver in fear.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Enemies hit by lightning strikes in melee combat
Explosion does not affect friendly troops
